**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Daily Maintenance Processes" Script="NLSApp.SetScriptTimeOut(1200000) NLSapp.ScriptOn(false) AutoCloseaddCompleted2018() AutoWOaddCompletePending2018() ACHCompanysync() LoanCommPrefs() PDFP() FirstPayDefaultFlag() WebPayments() DSpaymntMaint() DSBilltransMaint() reverseDSpayments() LoanDetail2udf46Maint() addssntocifudf15 "Top 20000","(0,1)" 'GenCBnotices()
'Task edit trailing period(.). see INCCRM-417 NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("Select 0; UPDATE task_detail SET userdef06 = left(userdef06,len(userdef06)-1) from task_detail where task_refno IN (Select t.task_refno from task_detail td, task t where t.task_refno = td.task_refno and t.task_template_no = 6 and right(td.userdef06,1) = '.')") 'Remove micro balances on open accounts NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET current_interest_balance = 0 ,current_payoff_balance = 0 where current_payoff_balance <= .01 and current_payoff_balance > -0.009 and status_code_no = 0") NLSapp.ScriptOn(true) NLSApp.SetField "CIF_DETAIL_UDF11", NOW() NLSApp.SaveScreen() NLSApp.MessageBox("Completed!")
'DebtsetFeeTransMaint() 'SyncACHWebpay() 'ACHCompanyUDF() 'NonACHDetail2udf45Maint()
'SUBS AND FUNCTIONS '----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
'SUBS------------------------------------------------------------- 'added 11/14/18 '------------------------------------------------------------------- Sub addssntocifudf15(size,ports) cifnolistsql = "SELECT " & size & " c.cifno " cifnocntsql = "SELECT count(*) -1" cifnofromsql = "from cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and portfolio_code_id IN " & ports & " and (cd.userdef15 is null or len(cd.userdef15) = 0) and c.tin is not null"
cifnocnt = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cifnocntsql & cifnofromsql) cifnolist = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cifnolistsql & cifnofromsql)
Redim cifnoarray(cifnocnt)
For x = 0 to cifnocnt cifnoarray(x) = cifnolist cifnolist = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Next
For each cifno in cifnoarray set fetched_cif = NLSapp.GetCIF(cifno) cifnumb = fetched_cif.CIFNumber ssn = fetched_cif.Tin sqlstring = "SELECT 0; UPDATE cif_detail SET userdef15 = '" & ssn & "' WHERE cifno = " & cifno NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement sqlstring set fetched_cif = nothing next End Sub
'added 10/16/18 '------------------------------------------------------------------- Sub GenCBnotices() coborrowernoticedetailssql = "Select distinct top 1000 " & chr(13) &_ "convert(varchar,ll.statement_code)+' '+" & chr(13) &_ "convert(char(1),l.portfolio_code_id)+' '+l.loan_number+' '+convert(varchar,ll.print_run_number)+' '+convert(varchar,clr.cifno)+' '+" & chr(13) &_ "convert(char(10),ll.printed_date,101)+' '+convert(varchar,ll.statement_row_id)+' '+convert(varchar,ll.sequence_in_run)+' '+" & chr(13) &_ "convert(char(10),ll.statement_date,101)+' '+convert(char(10), l.curr_maturity_date,101)+' '+" & chr(13) &_ "convert(varchar,cast(ll.current_rate as decimal(8,2)))+'% $'+convert(varchar,cast(ll.current_principal_balance AS money),1)+' $'+" & chr(13) &_ "convert(varchar,cast(ll.current_interest_balance AS money),1)+' $'+convert(varchar,cast(ll.total_past_due_balance AS money),1)+' $'+" & chr(13) &_ "convert(varchar,cast(ll.total_current_due_balance AS money),1) as details " & chr(13) &_ "INTO #coborrowerlatenotlist " & chr(13) &_ "from loanacct l , loanacct_latenotice ll," & chr(13) &_ "cif_loan_relationship clr" & chr(13) &_ "where ll.acctrefno = l.acctrefno" & chr(13) &_ "and clr.acctrefno = l.acctrefno" & chr(13) &_ "--and ll.statement_code = 223" & chr(13) &_ "and clr.forward_latenotice = 1" & chr(13) &_ "and ll.printed_date >= dateadd(dd,-3,convert(char(10),getdate(),101))" & chr(13) &_ "and ll.statement_row_id NOT IN (SELECT new_value from cif_modification_history where item_changed = 'Co-borrower Notice' )" & chr(13) &_ " " & chr(13) &_ "SELECT (select count(*)-1 from #coborrowerlatenotlist) as size, details from #coborrowerlatenotlist" & chr(13) &_ "DROP TABLE #coborrowerlatenotlist"
listUB = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(coborrowernoticedetailssql)
If listUB = "" Then MsgBox("There are no notices to process.") Exit Sub End If
'Populate array Redim coborrowernoticedetail(listUB) For row = 0 to listUB coborrowernoticedetail(row) = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Next
For Each contact in coborrowernoticedetail 'Create late Notice currentcoborrower = split(contact," ") docno = currentcoborrower(0) portfolio = currentcoborrower(1) loan_numb = currentcoborrower(2) cifno = currentcoborrower(4) stmnt_date = currentcoborrower(8) mat_date = currentcoborrower(9) rate = currentcoborrower(10) prin = currentcoborrower(11) intr = currentcoborrower(12) tot_pd = currentcoborrower(13) tot_cd = currentcoborrower(14) Miscdetails = "Print run: " & chr(9) & currentcoborrower(3) & chr(10) & "Print date: " & chr(9) & currentcoborrower(5) & chr(10) & _ "Sequence No: " & chr(9) & currentcoborrower(7) & chr(10) & "Stmnt Row ID: " & chr(9) & currentcoborrower(6) commentheader = "Primary Borrower Late Notice print details"
'Update Contact detail UDF fields that hold statement info cifupdatesql = "SELECT 0;" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE cif_detail SET userdef35 = '" & stmnt_date & "',userdef36 ='" & loan_numb & "'," & Chr(13) & _ "userdef37 = '" & mat_date & "', userdef38 = '" & rate & "',userdef39 ='" & prin & "'," & Chr(13) & _ "userdef40 = '" & intr & "',userdef41 = '" & tot_pd & "',userdef42 ='" & tot_cd & "'" & Chr(13) & _ " WHERE cifno = " & cifno
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cifupdatesql)
'Generate late notice Document and send to print queue template = getdoctempidno(docno) Set DT = NLSApp.GetDocumentTemplates(template) DT.GenerateDocument cifno, "TRUE", "LATE NOTICE", "TRUE", "T:\Temp\" Set DT = nothing 'Update Que record details docqueueID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cast(MAX(documentqueueid) as varchar) from DocumentQueue where len(DocumentName) = 0 and parentrefno = " & cifno) commentrowID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cast(MAX(row_id) as varchar) from cif_comments where category_id = 14 and cifno = " & cifno) NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE DocumentQueue SET DocumentName = 'CO-BORROWER LATE NOTICES', DocumentPageCount = 1 where DocumentQueueID = " & docqueueID) NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE cif_comments SET comments = '" & commentheader & chr(10) & Miscdetails & "' where row_id = " & commentrowID)
'Update contact History NLSapp.AddModificationHistory 0, cifno, "", currentcoborrower(6), "Co-borrower Notice" ciflist = ciflist & cifno & chr(10) Next
'msgbox(ciflist) End Sub '------------------------------------------------------------------- 'added 07/02/2018 Sub ACHCompanysync() loanACHlistsql = "SELECT distinct convert(varchar,l.acctrefno) + ','+ convert(varchar,l.portfolio_code_id) + ','+ convert(varchar,l.loan_class2_no) + ',' + " & chr(13) & _ "CASE WHEN lach.row_id IS NULL THEN '' Else convert(varchar,lach.row_id) END + ','+ " & chr(13) & _ "CASE WHEN lach.ach_company_id IS NULL THEN '' Else convert(varchar,lach.ach_company_id) END + ','+ " & chr(13) & _ "CASE WHEN ld2.userdef45 IS NULL THEN '' Else convert(varchar,ld2.userdef45) END as list " & chr(13) & _ "Into #loanachlist" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_detail_2 ld2," & chr(13) & _ "loanacct l" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join" & chr(13) & _ "loanacct_ach lach" & chr(13) & _ "on" & chr(13) & _ "l.acctrefno = lach.acctrefno and lach.status = 0" & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "and l.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT (Select count(*) from #loanachlist),list from #loanachlist /*where list like '111618%'*/ order by list" & chr(13) & _ "Drop table #loanachlist"
p = 0 u = 0
'Disable ALL outside scripting NLSapp.ScriptOn(false)
loanACHlistcnt = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(loanACHlistsql )
ReDim loanACHlist(loanACHlistcnt-1)
start = Time() For rowno = 1 to loanACHlistcnt r = rowno-1 loanACHlist(r) = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
nextrow = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Next
For Each record in loanACHlist
loandetail = split(record,",") sourceclass2no = loandetail(2) targetinvestor = split(investormatrix(sourceclass2no),",")
If Not loandetail(2) = 0 Then If loandetail(1) = 0 Then targetACHno = targetinvestor(2) Else targetACHno = targetinvestor(4) End if
If NOT Len(loandetail(4)) = 0 then If NOT loandetail(4) = targetACHno Then p = P + 1 achidupdatesqlp = "SELECT 0;" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct_ach SET ach_company_id = " & targetACHno & chr(13) & _ "where row_id = " & loandetail(3)
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(achidupdatesqlp)
End If End If
If NOT loandetail(5) = targetACHno Then u = u + 1 achidupdatesqlu = "SELECT 0;" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef45 = " & targetACHno & chr(13) & _ "WHERE acctrefno = " & loandetail(0)
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(achidupdatesqlu)
End If End If Next
'Re-Enable outside scripting NLSapp.ScriptOn(true)
finish = Time()
dailynoteemail = "Miss-matched ACH setups: " & p & chr(13) & chr(10) & "Miss-matched UDF45s: " & u & chr(13) & chr(10) & "Start time: " & FormatDateTime(start,vbLongTime) & chr(13) & chr(10) & "Finish time: " & FormatDateTime(finish,vbLongTime) dailynotexml = "Daily ACH Sync&#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;Miss-matched ACH setups: " & p & "&#13;&#10;Miss-matched UDF45s: " & u & "&#13;&#10;Start time: " & FormatDateTime(start,vbLongTime) & "&#13;&#10;Finish time: " & FormatDateTime(finish,vbLongTime) NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", "smuhammad@bills.com", "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", "Daily ACH Sync", dailynoteemail logXML = "<NLS><NLSLOG LogTypeDescription=""Scripting"" ErrorStatus=""0"" Log=""" & dailynotexml &"""/></NLS>" ImportXML(logXML) 'msgbox(dailynoteemail)
End Sub '-------------------------------------------------------------------
sub LoanDetail2udf46Maint() 'Maintains the next ACH payment date field in LoanDeatail2 udf46 to stay in sync with the ach.billing_next_date field 'This is to be used as a endpoint in a get command on the custom web portal.
d2_userdef46sql = "SELECT distinct l.loan_number,l.acctrefno, Left(min(la.billing_next_date),12) as 'nextachdate'" & chr(13) & _ "INTO #activeach " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_ach la, loanacct l " & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = la.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and la.status = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and l.status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "group by l.loan_number,l.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ " " & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef46 = NULL " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_detail_2 " & chr(13) & _ "WHERE userdef46 IS NOT NULL " & chr(13) & _ "and acctrefno NOT IN (select acctrefno from #activeach)" & chr(13) & _ " " & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef46 = a.nextachdate " & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_detail_2 ld2, #activeach a " & chr(13) & _ "Where ld2.acctrefno = a.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and ld2.userdef46 <> a.nextachdate " & chr(13) & _ " " & chr(13) & _ "drop table #activeach "
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(d2_userdef46sql) End sub
'--------------------------------------------------------------------
'ReverseDSpayments.vb 'Looks for un-reversed debt settlement payment transactions (TC8200) and their corresponding loan payment transactions 'that have been reversed. it then uses XML import to reverse the TC8200 transaction
Sub reverseDSpayments()
revtranslookupsql = "select distinct " & chr(13) & _ "'<NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE ' + " & chr(13) & _ "'TransactionCode=""' + left(lth1.transaction_code,3) + '1' + '"" EffectiveDate=""' + convert(char(8),getdate(),1) + '"" LoanNumber=""' + l.loan_number + '"" TransRefNo=""' + + convert(varchar,lth1.transrefno) + " & chr(13) & _ "'"" Amount=""' + convert(varchar,lth1.transaction_amount) + '"" RowID=""' + lth1.userdef01 + '""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS>' " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_trans_history lth1, /*lth1 represents the DS transaction*/" & chr(13) & _ "loanacct_trans_history lth2, /*lth2 represents the loan payment transaction*/" & chr(13) & _ "loanacct l " & chr(13) & _ "where lth1.userdef04 is not null " & chr(13) & _ "and lth1.acctrefno = l.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and cast(lth2.transaction_reference_no as varchar) = lth1.userdef04 /*pairs DS transaction to it loan payment transaction*/" & chr(13) & _ "and (lth1.reversal_transrefno = 0 and not lth2.reversal_transrefno = 0) /*DS transaction has not been reversed but the loan payment has been reversed*/" & chr(13) & _ "and lth2.transaction_date > '02/01/18' /*not valid for transactions prior to implementation date*/"
Do RevtransXML = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(revtranslookupsql)
'Sample output 'RevtransXML = "<NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""8201"" EffectiveDate=""03/21/18"" LoanNumber=""APP-00553272"" TransRefNo=""5256551"" Amount=""500.00"" RowID=""3089124""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS>"
If Not RevtransXML = "" Then ImportXML(RevtransXML) End If
Loop Until RevtransXML = ""
End Sub
Sub AutoCloseaddCompleted2018() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Close Loans in COMPLETE PENDING status for prescribed waiting period or more and queue up ZERO Balance letter for printing or email ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Get loan detail lookup sql statement in global variable and 'set the upper limit on records available to process arrayUB = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(PENDING_COMPLETE_CLOSE_LOAN_SQL)
detailcnt = 0
If arrayUB = "" then Exit Sub End if
'Dim array to hold sql lookup results of list of valid loan numbers Redim loanlist(arrayUB)
' Populate array For count = 0 to arrayUB loandetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() loanlist(count) = loandetail skipcol = NLSapp. SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Next
For Each detail in loanlist
rowdetails = Split (detail,",") loannumber = rowdetails(0) refno = rowdetails(1) Suspense = rowdetails(2) template = rowdetails(3) SendToQueue = rowdetails(4) emailtoaddr = rowdetails(5) name = rowdetails(6) fname = rowdetails(7) lname = rowdetails(8) datenow = date() detailcnt = detailcnt + 1 If detailcnt = 1 Then refnolist = refno Else refnolist = refnolist & "," & refno End If
If Not CDbl(Suspense) = 0 Then ClosureImportXMLp1 = "<TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""462"" EffectiveDate=""" & datenow & _ """ LoanNumber=""" & loannumber & """ Amount=""" & Suspense & """/></TRANSACTIONS>" Else ClosureImportXMLp1 = "" End if
ClosureImportXMLp2 = "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & loannumber & """ LoanStatusCode=""CLOSED"" ClosedDate=""" & datenow & """ >" & _ "<LOANSTATUSES Operation=""DELETE"" LoanStatusCode=""PENDING COMPLETE"" EffectiveDate=""" & datenow & """/> " & _ "<LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""COMPLETED"" EffectiveDate=""" & datenow & """/></LOAN> " 'XML string Format: '<NLS> '<TRANSACTIONS> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="462" EffectiveDate="07/21/17" LoanNumber="APP-00999999" Amount="537.43" /> ' </TRANSACTIONS> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag="1" LoanNumber="APP-00999999" LoanStatusCode="CLOSED" ClosedDate="07/21/17" > ' <LOANSTATUSES Operation="DELETE" LoanStatusCode="PENDING COMPLETE" EffectiveDate="07/21/17"/> ' <LOANSTATUSES Operation="ADD" LoanStatusCode="COMPLETED" EffectiveDate="07/21/17"/> ' </LOAN> '</NLS> 'nlsApp.messageBox("<NLS>" & ClosureImportXMLp1 & ClosureImportXMLp2 & "</NLS>")
loanclosureresult = PendingCompleteClosureImportXML("<NLS>" & ClosureImportXMLp1 & ClosureImportXMLp2 & "</NLS>", refno)
If loanclosureresult = "" Then
If SendToQueue = "TRUE" Then
'Generate zero balance Document Set DT = NLSApp.GetDocumentTemplates(template) DT.GenerateDocument refno, "TRUE", "SERVICING NOTES", SendToQueue, "T:\Temp\" Set DT = nothing
docqueueID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cast(MAX(documentqueueid) as varchar) from DocumentQueue where len(DocumentName) = 0 and parentrefno = " & refno) NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE DocumentQueue SET DocumentName = 'ZERO BALANCE LETTER', DocumentPageCount = 1 where DocumentQueueID = " & docqueueID) End If
Logmsg = "Daily Auto-Closure process &#13;Refno: " & refno logXML = "<NLS><NLSLOG LogTypeDescription=""Scripting"" ErrorStatus=""0"" Log=""" & Logmsg &"""/></NLS>" ImportXML(logXML)
Else 'PLACEHOLDER failedclosuremsg = failedclosuremsg & chr(10) & chr(10) & loanclosureresult 'NLSApp.MessageBox("There was a problem closing refno " & refno & ".") End If Next
If not failedclosuremsg = "" Then failedclosuremsg = "FAILED AUTO-CLOSURES for " & DATE() & chr(10) & chr(10) & failedclosuremsg NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", "smuhammad@freedomplus.com", "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", "Failed Auto-Closures", failedclosuremsg NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", "NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com", "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", "Failed Auto-Closures", failedclosuremsg 'NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", "dsanders@freedomplus.com", "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", "Failed Auto-Closures", failedclosuremsg 'NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", "brios@freedomplus.com", "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", "Failed Auto-Closures", failedclosuremsg End if
'RESET COMMENT, TRANSAcTION and MOD HISTORY userid to ADMINISTRATOR refnolist = "(" & refnolist & ")" If SetAdminuser(refnolist) = -1 Then subject = "Pending Complete Admin update FAILURE!" toaddress = "NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com" '"somebody@bills.com" body1 = "Acctrefno: " & refno & CHR(13) & "Update Error setting script user to Admin. Please investigate." NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", toaddress, "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", subject, body1 End if
End Sub
Sub AutoWOaddCompletePending2018() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Automatic Write-off loan balances $10 or less set loan status to COMPLETE PENDING ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo() authuser = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(varchar(12),groupno) from nlsgroupmembers where userno = " & userno & " and groupno IN (11)") 'Current Authrized User group(s) 11-Admin
lookupallloanssql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cd.userdef18 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'AUTO WRITEOFFCLOSE'") lookuponeloansql = lookupallloanssql & Chr(13) & "and l.acctrefno in (" & NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") & ")" lookupsql = lookuponeloansql
'Members of authorized user groups can opt to process all eligible loans If authuser <> "" Then 'If NLSApp.YseNoMessageBox("Select Yes to process all available loans.") Then lookupsql = lookupallloanssql 'End If End If
writeoffxml = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupsql)
If len(writeoffxml) = 0 Then writeoffxml = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Do Until writeoffxml = "***END OF RESULT***" refno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() refnolist = refnolist & refno & ", "
AddWOandPendingComplete(writeoffxml & refno) 'Expected XML string output Format: '<NLS> ' <TRANSACTIONS> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="540" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="544" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="448" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="452" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' </TRANSACTIONS> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag="1" LoanNumber="APP-00099999"> ' <LOANSTATUSES Operation="ADD" LoanStatusCode="PENDING COMPLETE" EffectiveDate="07/21/17"/> ' <LOANCOMMENTS Comment="Remaining loan balance written-off due to balance below $10. " Category="SERVICING NOTES" CommentDescription="Balance write-off" CreatedBy="0"/> ' </LOAN> '</NLS>
writeoffxml = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop
If not refnolist = "" Then refnolist = "(" & Left(refnolist, Len(refnolist) - 2) & ")" End if
'RESET COMMENT, TRANSAcTION and MOD HISTORY userid to ADMINISTRATOR If SetAdminuser(refnolist) = -1 Then subject = "Pending Complete Admin update FAILURE!" toaddress = "NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com" '"somebody@bills.com" body1 = "Acctrefno: " & refno & CHR(13) & "Update Error setting script user to Admin. Please investigate." NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", toaddress, "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", subject, body1 End If
End Sub
Sub SyncACHWebpay() acctrefno = 9999 acctsyncsql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef44 from cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'ACH MONITOR'")
Do Until acctrefno = "" acctrefno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(acctsyncsql)
investorname = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() port_code = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() If port_code = "0" Then port_code = "PLUS PORTFOLIO" Else port_code = "CONSOL PLUS" End If detail2udf45 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
ACHCompanySyncatupdate2018 acctrefno,investorname,port_code,detail2udf45 loopcnt = loopcnt + 1 Loop 'Loop until loopcnt = 4
End Sub
Sub ACHCompanyUDF() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'ACH Company UDF Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' refnosql = "SELECT nonachUDFs.acctrefno,nonachUDFs.UDFtarget" & chr(13) & _ "FROM" & chr(13) & _ "(SELECT distinct " & chr(13) & _ "convert(varchar(10),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno," & chr(13) & _ "la.loan_class2_no," & chr(13) & _ "lach.ach_company_id," & chr(13) & _ "la.portfolio_code_id,ld2.userdef45," & chr(13) & _ "'UDFtarget'= CASE" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 2 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 1" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 2 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 4" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 4 THEN 3" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 7 THEN 7" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 8 THEN 8" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 9 THEN 9" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 10 THEN 10" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 11 THEN 11" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 12 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 12" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 12 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 15" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 13 THEN 13" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 15 THEN 16" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 16 THEN 17" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 17 THEN 18" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 18 THEN 19" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 19 THEN 20" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 20 THEN 21" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 21 THEN 22" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 22 THEN 23" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 23 THEN 24" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 24 THEN 25" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 25 THEN 26" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 26 THEN 27" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 27 THEN 32" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 28 THEN 28" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 29 THEN 30" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 30 THEN 31" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 31 THEN 29" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 32 THEN 34" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 33 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 35" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 33 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 38" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 34 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 36" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 34 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 37" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 35 THEN 39" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 36 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 41" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 36 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 40" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 37 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 43" & chr(13) &_ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 37 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 42" & chr(13) &_ "ELSE 9999" & chr(13) & _ "END" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_ach lach, loanacct_detail_2 ld2, loanacct la, loan_class lc,ach_company ach" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE lach.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lc.codenum = la.loan_class2_no" & chr(13) & _ "AND lach.ach_company_id = ach.ach_company_id" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "and lach.status = 0" & chr(13) & _ "/*AND la.loan_class1_no 1*/) nonachUDFs" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE nonachUDFs.UDFtarget <> nonachUDFs.userdef45 " & chr(13) & _ "OR nonachUDFs.userdef45 IS NULL"
LoanRefNo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(refnosql) 'NLSApp.MessageBox( LoanRefNo)
If LoanRefNo = "" Then LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Lcount = 0
Do Until LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" Lcount = Lcount + 1 achid = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
achxml = "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & LoanRefNo & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined45=""" & achid & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(achxml)
LoanRefNo = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "ACH Company UDF Proccessing", "Loans Processed " & Lcount 'NLSApp.MessageBox("Loans Processed " & Lcount) End If
End Sub
Sub LoanCommPrefs() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Communication Preferences Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' Commsetuplookupsqltxt = "SELECT distinct la.loan_number, convert(varchar(15),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno," & chr(13) & _ "convert(char(1),lcp.StatementOptionFlags),lca.Address," & chr(13) & _ "'MailOptIn' = CASE When la.portfolio_code_id=0 THEN ld1.userdef18" & chr(13) & _ "When la.portfolio_code_id=1 THEN ld1.userdef17 END," & chr(13) & _ "cif.email, cif.cifnumber" & chr(13) & _ "from cif cif, loanacct_detail ld1,loanacct la" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join" & chr(13) & _ "LoanCommunicationPreferences lcp" & chr(13) & _ "on " & chr(13) & _ "la.acctrefno = lcp.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join" & chr(13) & _ "LoanCommunicationAddress lca" & chr(13) & _ "on" & chr(13) & _ "lca.LoanCommunicationPreferencesID = lcp.LoanCommunicationPreferencesID" & chr(13) & _ "Where ld1.acctrefno = la.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND cif.cifno = la.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "AND ((lcp.StatementOptionFlags IS NULL AND (CASE When la.portfolio_code_id=0 THEN ld1.userdef18" & chr(13) & _ "When la.portfolio_code_id=1 THEN ld1.userdef17 END)= 0)" & chr(13) & _ "OR (lcp.StatementOptionFlags = 2 AND lca.Address IS NULL)" & chr(13) & _ "OR (lcp.StatementOptionFlags = 1 AND (CASE When la.portfolio_code_id=0 THEN ld1.userdef18" & chr(13) & _ "When la.portfolio_code_id=1 THEN ld1.userdef17 END)= 0) )" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.loan_number not like 'CP%A' " & chr(13) & _ "AND la.loan_number not like '%dummy%'" & chr(13) & _ "order by acctrefno ,mailoptin desc"
LoanNumber = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Commsetuplookupsqltxt) loopcnt = 0
If LoanNumber = "" Then LoanNumber = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Lcount = 0
Do Until LoanNumber = "***END OF RESULT***"
Loanrefno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Flag = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Commemail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Optin = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Cntemail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If Optin = 1 Then Optinflag = 1 Else Optinflag = 2 End If CIFNum = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If Cntemail = "" Then Optinflag = 1 Cntemail = "LScontact@ffn.com" cifemailxml = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & CIFNum & """ Entity=""INDIVIDUAL"" EmailAddress1=""LScontact@ffn.com""/>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(cifemailxml)
End If
commprefxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""UTF-8"" standalone=""yes""?>" & chr(13) & _ "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & LoanNumber & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESS Operation=""ADD"" Address=""" & Cntemail & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType=""Statement"" OptionFlags=""" & Optinflag & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " </COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
'NLSApp.MessageBox(loopcnt & " - " & LoanNumber)
ImportXML(commprefxml) LoanNumber = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop
If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "Loan Comm Prefs Proccessing", "Loans Processed " & Lcount ' NLSApp.MessageBox( "Loans Processed " & Lcount) End If End Sub
Sub WebPayments() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Web payments Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'SET PENDING STATUSES-----------------------------------------------------------
sqlstring1 = "select convert(varchar(10),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno, pt.ach_trace_number,'PENDING' as Status,ld2.userdef41,null" & chr(13) & _ "FROM pending_transactions pt, loanacct la, loanacct_detail_2 ld2" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = pt.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef35 = 'SUBMITTED'" & chr(13) & _ "AND convert(datetime,ld2.userdef41) = pt.effective_date" & chr(13) & _ "UNION" & chr(13) & _ "select convert(varchar(10),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno, lph.ach_trace_number,'COMPLETED', ld2.userdef41,lph.date_paid" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_payment_history lph, loanacct la, loanacct_detail_2 ld2" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = lph.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef35 = 'SUBMITTED'" & chr(13) & _ "AND convert(datetime,ld2.userdef41) = lph.date_paid" & chr(13) & _ "UNION" & chr(13) & _ "select convert(varchar(10),ld2.acctrefno) ,null,'COMPLETED',ld2.userdef41,lph.date_paid" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_payment_history lph, loanacct_detail_2 ld2 " & chr(13) & _ "WHERE ld2.acctrefno = lph.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef35 = 'PENDING' " & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef34 =lph.ach_trace_number" & chr(13) & _ "AND convert(datetime,ld2.userdef41) = lph.date_paid"
LoanRefNo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(sqlstring1)
If LoanRefNo = "" Then LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" End If Lcount = 0 Do Until LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***"
achtrace = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() status = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If status = "PENDING" Then
xmlstrng1 = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & LoanRefNo & """>" & _ " <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined34=""" & achtrace & """ UserDefined35=""" & status & """ />" & _ " </LOAN>" & _ "</NLS>" End If
If status = "COMPLETED" Then
xmlstrng1 = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & LoanRefNo & """>" & _ " <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined35=""" & status & """ />" & _ " </LOAN>" & _ "</NLS>" End If
'NLSApp.MessageBox(xmlstrng1)
'XML Imports ImportXML(xmlstrng1)
LoanRefNo = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "Web Payments", "Loans Processed " & Lcount End If '------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'WebPay Clean up -- to catch any remaining loans that were not updated by previous process '-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
sysadmincifnum = "WEB PAY MAINT" userdefno = "18" Targetsql1 = "SELECT cd.userdef" & userdefno & " from cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno AND c.cifnumber = '" & sysadmincifnum & "'"
acctrefno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(Targetsql1))
If acctrefno = "" Then acctrefno = "***END OF RESULT***" End If Lcount = 0
Do Until acctrefno = "***END OF RESULT***" wpxml = "<NLS EnforceTagExistence='1'><LOAN UpdateFlag='1' AcctRefno='" & acctrefno & "'>" & chr(13) & _ "<LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined35='COMPLETED'/></LOAN></NLS>"
ImportXML(wpxml) acctrefno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop
End Sub
Sub PDFP() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'PDFP Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' TranRefNosql = "SELECT convert(varchar(12),lth.transrefno),lth.transaction_date," & chr(13) & _ "lth.effective_date,lth.date_due,la.current_suspense,la.loan_number" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct la,loanacct_trans_history lth," & chr(13) & _ "(SELECT DISTINCT la.loan_number,max(lth.transaction_date) as transaction_date" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct la,loanacct_trans_history lth WHERE la.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lth.transaction_code = '124' AND la.current_suspense > 0 AND la.current_suspense = la.total_past_due_balance" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0 AND lth.date_due < getdate() group by la.loan_number) lt" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lt.loan_number = la.loan_number" & chr(13) & _ "AND lt.transaction_date = lth.transaction_date" & chr(13) & _ "AND lth.transaction_code = '124' " & chr(13) & _ "UNION " & chr(13) & _ "SELECT distinct convert(varchar(12),lth.transrefno),lth.transaction_date," & chr(13) & _ "lth.effective_date,lth.date_due,la.total_past_due_balance,la.loan_number" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct la,loanacct_trans_history lth, loanacct_payments_due lpd" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lpd.payment_reference_no = lth.transaction_reference_no" & chr(13) & _ "AND lth.transaction_code = '124'" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "AND la.total_past_due_balance between .000010 and .01"
TranRefNo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(TranRefNosql)
If TranRefNo = "" Then TranRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Lcount = 0
Do Until TranRefNo ="***END OF RESULT***"
transdate = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() effdate = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() duedate = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() amount = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() loannum = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
revtransxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8""?>" & chr(13) & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <TRANSACTIONS>" & chr(13) & _ " <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""125"" EffectiveDate=""" & effdate & """ LoanNumber=""" & loannum & """ Amount=""" & amount & """ DateDue=""" & duedate & """ TransactionDate=""" & transdate & """ TransRefNo=""" & TranRefNo & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </TRANSACTIONS>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(revtransxml)
TranRefNo = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop
If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "PDFP Proccessing", "Loans Processed " & Lcount End if End Sub
Sub NonACHDetail2udf45Maint() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'For Updating Detail2 UDF45 with the ACH Company ID to be utilized by web portal one-tine ACH payment function ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' importsxml = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cd.userdef35 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd Where c.cifno = cd.cifno and cifnumber = 'WEB PAY MAINT'")) If len(importsxml) = 0 Then importsxml = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Do Until importsxml = "***END OF RESULT***"
ImportXML(importsxml) 'Expected XML string output Format: '<NLS> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag = "1" AcctRefno="155190" > ' <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined45 = "31" /> ' </LOAN> '</NLS>
importsxml = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Loop End Sub
Sub FirstPayDefaultFlag() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'First Pay Default Flag UDF Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' timecheck = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT Case When substring(cd.userdef03,10,25) > getdate() Then 'N' Else 'Y' End FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'FIRST PAY DEFAULTS'")
If timecheck = "Y" Then xmlsql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cd.userdef18 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'FIRST PAY DEFAULTS'")
detail2udf13xml = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(xmlsql)
If detail2udf13xml = "" Then detail2udf13xml = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Do Until detail2udf13xml = "***END OF RESULT***"
ImportXML(detail2udf13xml) 'Expected XML string output Format: '<NLS EnforceTagExistence="1"> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag="1" AcctRefno="999999" > ' <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined13 = "1" /> ' </LOAN> '</NLS>
detail2udf13xml = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop 'Update last/Next Run datetime and Last user record Runstamp = NOW() NextRun = Date() + 1 & " 8:00:00 AM" NextRun = NOW() UID = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo()
Cifupdate = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag='1'CIFNumber='FIRST PAY DEFAULTS'><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail3='Next Run: " & NextRun & _ "' CIFDetail4='Last Run: " & Runstamp & "' CIFDetail5=' UserID: " & UID & "' /></CIF></NLS>"
ImportXML(Cifupdate) End if
End Sub
Sub DSpaymntMaint() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Debt Settlement payment TC Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' paymentlookupsql = "Select " & chr(13) & _ "'<NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE ' + " & chr(13) & _ "'TransactionCode=""8200"" EffectiveDate=""' + convert(char(8),lth.date_paid,1) + '"" LoanNumber=""' + l.loan_number + " & chr(13) & _ "'"" Amount=""' + convert(varchar,lth.payment_amount) + '"" UserDefined1=""' + convert(varchar,lth.row_id) + '"" UserDefined4=""' + convert(varchar,lth.transaction_reference_no) + '""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS>', " & chr(13) & _ "'SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_payment_history SET userdef01 = ''Debt Settlement Payment'', userdef02 = ''YES'' where row_id = ' + convert(varchar,lth.row_id)" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_payment_history lth, " & chr(13) & _ "loanacct l, " & chr(13) & _ "loanacct_statuses ls, " & chr(13) & _ "( " & chr(13) & _ " Select acctrefno, max(mod_datestamp) as activetime " & chr(13) & _ " from ( " & chr(13) & _ " SELECT row_id,acctrefno,mod_datestamp " & chr(13) & _ " from loanacct_mod_history " & chr(13) & _ " where item_changed = 'Status' " & chr(13) & _ " and new_value like '%ACTIVE SETTLEMENT%' " & chr(13) & _ " and old_value not like '%ACTIVE SETTLEMENT%') activationtimes " & chr(13) & _ " group by acctrefno) times " & chr(13) & _ "where times.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and ls.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and ls.status_code_no IN (32, 34) " & chr(13) & _ "and userdef01 not like '%Debt Settlement Payment%' " & chr(13) & _ "and payment_type = 'ZZ' " & chr(13) & _ "and lth.nsf_flag = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and l.current_ol1_balance > 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and date_paid >= times.activetime "
Do AddDStransXML = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(paymentlookupsql) payHistUpdatesql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
'Sample output 'AddDStransXML = "<NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""8200"" EffectiveDate=""03/07/18"" LoanNumber=""CP0162960"" Amount=""463.00"" UserDefined1=""5138899""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS>" 'payHistUpdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_payment_history SET userdef01 = 'Debt Settlement Payment', userdef02 = 'YES' where row_id = 5138899"
If Not AddDStransXML = "" Then ImportXML(AddDStransXML) NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(payHistUpdatesql) End If count = count + 1 Loop Until AddDStransXML = ""
'USER ID update NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_trans_history SET enteredby_uid = 0 Where transaction_code IN ('8460','8440','8100','8200') and enteredby_uid in (39)")
End Sub
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Debt Settlement Fee Maint ' '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
Sub DebtsetFeeTransMaint()
'Set the list of transaction codes to include in the query i.e., '150','180','504' transcodestrg = "'" & LOAN_TRANS_CODE_LATE_FEE & "', '" & LOAN_TRANS_CODE_NSF_FEE & "', '" & LOAN_TRANS_CODE_CHECK_FEE & "'" 'Set the list of loan status codes to include in the query i.e., '32','34' statcodestrg = "'" & LOAN_STATUS_ACTIVE_SETTLEMENT & "', '" & LOAN_STATUS_BROKEN_SETTLEMENT & "'"
'SQL command that will lookup the loans with required fields to create transaction records. Output is an importable XML string and a SQL command string '***Sample SQL output*** 'CP000123, <NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""8280"" EffectiveDate=""02/26/18"" LoanNumber=""APP-00463650"" Amount=""15.00"" UserDefined1=""7135687"" UserDefined4=""5318695""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS> ',SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_trans_history SET userdef01 = 'Debt Settlement transaction', userdef02 = 'YES' where transrefno = 7135687
dsfeestblsql = "Select convert(varchar(15),l.acctrefno) as acctrefno, 'transimportxml' = " & chr(13) & _ "'<NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE ' + " & chr(13) & _ "'TransactionCode=""8' + convert(varchar,lth.transaction_code) + " & chr(13) & _ "'"" EffectiveDate=""' + convert(char(8),lth.transaction_date,1) + '"" LoanNumber=""' + l.loan_number + " & chr(13) & _ "'"" Amount=""' + convert(varchar,lth.transaction_amount) + '"" UserDefined1=""' + convert(varchar,lth.transrefno) + " & chr(13) & _ "'"" UserDefined4=""' + convert(varchar,lth.transaction_reference_no) + '""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS>', " & chr(13) & _ "'transupdatesql' = 'SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_trans_history SET userdef01 = ''DEBT SETTLEMENT TRANS'', userdef02 = ''YES'' where transrefno = ' + convert(varchar,lth.transrefno)" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_trans_history lth, " & chr(13) & _ "loanacct l, " & chr(13) & _ "loanacct_statuses ls," & chr(13) & _ "( " & chr(13) & _ " Select acctrefno, max(mod_datestamp) as activetime " & chr(13) & _ " from ( " & chr(13) & _ " SELECT row_id,acctrefno,mod_datestamp " & chr(13) & _ " from loanacct_mod_history " & chr(13) & _ " where item_changed = 'Status' " & chr(13) & _ " and new_value like '%ACTIVE SETTLEMENT%' " & chr(13) & _ " and old_value not like '%ACTIVE SETTLEMENT%') activationtimes " & chr(13) & _ " group by acctrefno) times " & chr(13) & _ "where times.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and ls.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and ls.status_code_no IN (" & statcodestrg & ") " & chr(13) & _ "and (userdef01 not like 'DEBT SETTLEMENT TRANS' or userdef01 IS NULL)" & chr(13) & _ "and lth.transaction_code IN (" & transcodestrg & ") " & chr(13) & _ "and lth.reversal_transrefno = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and l.current_ol1_balance > 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and lth.transaction_date >= times.activetime " & chr(13) & _ " order by l.acctrefno,[transimportxml]"
'dim dynamic array to hold sql results redim DSfeeslist(2,1)
'populate array data with sql output Do until nextrefno = "***END OF RESULT***" rowcnt = UBound(DSfeeslist,2)
If rowcnt = 1 Then DSfeeslist(0,rowcnt) = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(dsfeestblsql) else DSfeeslist(0,rowcnt) = nextrefno end if
DSfeeslist(1,rowcnt) = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() DSfeeslist(2,rowcnt) = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() nextrefno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
If not nextrefno = "***END OF RESULT***" Then redim Preserve DSfeeslist(2,rowcnt + 1) End if
Loop
'Run XML Import process and SQL updates to Add and Update transaction records For counter = 1 to rowcnt
ImportXML(DSfeeslist(1,counter)) NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(DSfeeslist(2,counter))
Next End Sub
Sub DSBilltransMaint() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Debt Billing Transaction (124) TC Maintainance ' ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' translookupsql = "Select distinct 'UPDATE loanacct_recurring_trans set event_transaction_due_date = ''' + convert(char(10),event_startdate+16,101) + ''' where row_id = ' + convert(varchar(10),row_id)" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_recurring_trans " & chr(13) & _ "where rec_trans_description = 'Debt Settlment Billing Transactions' " & chr(13) & _ "and event_startdate+16 <> event_transaction_due_date"
transupdatesrow = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(translookupsql)
If Not transupdatesrow = "" Then
Do Until transupdatesrow = "***END OF RESULT***" 'Do Until count = 2 transupdates = transupdates & chr(13) & transupdatesrow transupdatesrow = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() count = count + 1 Loop End If 'NLSapp.MessageBox("SELECT 0; " & transupdates) NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; " & transupdates)
End Sub

Function AddWOandPendingComplete(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString() endmark = "</NLS>" refno = Mid(xml, InStr(xml, endmark) + len(endmark), len(xml) - InStr(xml, endmark) + len(endmark))
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then errormsg = NLSApp.GetErrorString() subject = "Pending Complete Loan Closure process IMPORT FAILURE!" toaddress = "NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com" '"somebody@bills.com" body1 = "Acctrefno: " & refno & CHR(13) & "Import Error: " & chr(13) & errormsg & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", toaddress, "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", subject, body1 End If AddWOandPendingComplete = errormsg & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("") AddWOandPendingComplete = "" End If End Function
Function ACHCompanySyncatupdate2018(refno,Investor,Portfolio,WebACH) ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Maintains sync with Class 2 (Investor) with ACH Company and detail 2 UDF45 (Web pay ACH company) 'Triggered when individual loan account is changed or updated. ' '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
'Declare variables runtimestamp = Now() emailyn = "N" userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo() 'refno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") 'Investor = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CLASS2") 'Portfolio = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") 'WebACH = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45") targetACH = InvestorACHSync(Investor, Portfolio) 'SQL to look up all active ACH records that do not match target ACH Company ID nomatchACHsql = "select convert(varchar,row_id) from loanacct_ach where status = 0 and acctrefno = " & refno & " and ach_company_id <> " & targetACH 'Hold query results here nomatchACHrowID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(nomatchACHsql)
'Other variables modhistupdatesql = "" loanach = "" loandetail = "" achxml = "" Detail2pdatesql = "" ACHUpdatesql = ""
'MsgBox("acctrefno = " & acctrefno & chr(13) & "Port = " & Portfolio) ' MsgBox("target ach = " & targetACH) 'MsgBox("ach row id = " & nomatchACHrowID) ' MsgBox("udf 45 = " & WebACH)
'Did any ACH rows not match targetACH? If Not nomatchACHrowID = "" Then Do Until nomatchACHrowID = "" '"***END OF RESULT***" ACHUpdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_ach SET ach_company_id = " & targetACH & " Where row_id = " & nomatchACHrowID
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(ACHUpdatesql) nomatchACHrowID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(nomatchACHsql) Loop
Else 'MsgBox("all match") End If
'Does the current Web Portal ACH Company ID match the correct ACH Company ID? If Not targetACH = WebACH Then Detail2updatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef45 = '" & targetACH & "' Where acctrefno = " & refno NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Detail2updatesql) End If ACHCompanySyncatupdate2018 = "" End Function
Function getdoctempidno(statementcode)
SELECT Case statementcode CASE "14" 'CPLUS 3 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "10" CASE "13" 'CPLUS 11 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "11" CASE "15" 'CPLUS 22 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "12" CASE "16" 'CPLUS 52 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "13" CASE "17" 'CPLUS 82 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "14" CASE "18" 'FPLUS 3 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "15" CASE "19" 'FPLUS 11 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "16" CASE "20" 'FPLUS 22 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "17" CASE "21" 'FPLUS 52 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "18" CASE "22" 'FPLUS 82 DAY NOTICE getdoctempidno = "19"
End Select
End Function "/> <BUTTON Name="Experian Score file Import" Script="'###Contact view ADMINISTRATION PAGE Experian Import field 'on Button click option selection 'For selected file in designated directory, processes list of loans for updates
Startrowno = 2 CellVal = "unassigned" Const xlExcel7 = 39 fplusrows = 0 cplusrows = 0 Invalidloans = 0 Invalidclass2 = 0 secsnow = "" timestring = "" targetfolder = EXPERIAN_IMPORTS_PENDING_DIR completefolder = EXPERIAN_IMPORTS_COMPLETED_DIR targetfolder = "\\tsclient\C\Users\SMUHAMMAD\OneDrive - Freedom Financial Network\NLS\Experian\PendingUpdates" targetsavfolder = "\\tsclient" completefolder = "\\tsclient\C\Users\SMUHAMMAD\OneDrive - Freedom Financial Network\NLS\Experian\CompletedUpdates\"
'Dim dynamic array to hold sql lookup results of list of valid loan numbers redim loanlist(1)
'object management Dim objExcel, objShell, objShellFolderFile,objShellFolderSavFile, objFsFolder,odjFs,objFsFolderItems
'Shell objects Set objShell = CreateObject("Shell.Application") set objshellFolder = objShell.NameSpace(targetfolder) set objShellFolderFileItems = objshellFolder.Items Set objShellFolderFile = objShell.BrowseForFolder(0, "Please select the file From your local Mapped drives.", &H0008+&H0020+&H4000+&H0200, targetfolder) If Not (objShellFolderFile Is Nothing) Then strExcelPath = CStr(objShellFolderFile.Self.path)
Folderitemscnt = objShellFolderFileItems.count
'Filesys Objects set objFs = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") ' set objFsFolder = objFs.GetFolder(targetfolder) ' Foldersize = objFsFolder.size ' If Foldersize > 0 Then ' 'msgBox(objFsFolder.size) ' 'msgBox(objShellFolderFileItems.count) ' End If
'Excel objects Set objExcel = CreateObject("Excel.Application")
Set objWorkbook = objExcel.Workbooks.Open(strExcelPath)
objExcel.DisplayAlerts = False
'Evaluate selected excel file and mark rows with valid records for processing Do Until CellVal = "" allrowcount = allrowcount+1 CellVal = objExcel.Cells(allrowcount,1).Value InvVal = objExcel.Cells(allrowcount,3).Value validloan = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("Select count(*) from loanacct where loan_number = '" & CellVal & "'") validclass2 = 1 If (allrowcount > 1) and (not CellVal = "") Then datarows = datarows + 1
If validloan = 0 Then Invalidloans = Invalidloans + 1 End if 'Set failure code - SELECT Case validloan case "1" validrecords = validrecords + 1 objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 4).Value = "OK"
case "0" objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 4).Value = "F1"
End select
loanlist(datarows-1) = CellVal & validloan redim preserve loanlist(datarows) End if Loop
'Summary message msgheader = datarows & " Records Submitted for Processing." & chr(13) & chr(13) 'msgline1 = "CPlus Loans: " & cplusrows & chr(10) & "FPlus Loans: " & fplusrows & chr(13) msgline2 = "Invalid Loan Numbers (F1): " & Invalidloans & chr(13) 'msgline3 = "Invalid Investor Designations (F2): " & Invalidclass2 & chr(13) & chr(13) msgline4 = "Total valid loan records submitted for update: " & 0 + validrecords & chr(13) & chr(13) msgfooter = "Continue (Y/N)" 'Save summary message to worksheet objExcel.Cells(1,7).Value = "PROCESSING SUMARY " & NOW() objExcel.Cells(2,7).Value = msgheader 'objExcel.Cells(3,7).Value = msgline1 objExcel.Cells(4,7).Value = msgline2 'objExcel.Cells(5,7).Value = msgline3 objExcel.Cells(6,7).Value = msgline4
If Not NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox(msgheader & msgline1 & msgline2 & msgline3 & msgline4 & msgfooter)Then 'Close without processing if "NO" objWorkbook.Close objExcel.quit set objExcel = nothing set objShell = nothing NLSApp.MessageBox("Process Canceled.") Else 'Process valid records then close and move file to Completed folder if there are no errors processresult = processupdates (allrowcount,Startrowno,1) If processresult = "1" Then msgbox("Updates Completed!") Else 'If there are errors in processing all valid loans NLSApp.MessageBox("There was a problem with Updating the loans below." & chr(13) & processresult) msgbox("Updates Completed!") End if
'Close Excel object and move processed file to completed folder objWorkbook.Save objWorkbook.Close objExcel.quit
'set objExcel = nothing 'set objShell = nothing objFs.GetFolder(targetfolder) Set objShellFolderSavFile = objShell.BrowseForFolder(0, "Please select the file From your local Mapped drives.",&H0008+&H0020,targetsavfolder)
completefolder = CStr(objShellFolderSavFile.Self.path) & "\" savefilepath = CStr(objShellFolderSavFile.Self.path) & "\" & "ExperianImport" & DateFormat(NOW(),1012) & ".xlsx" objFs.MoveFile strExcelPath,savefilepath
If objFs.FileExists(savefilepath) = True Then MsgBox("Results file saved to: " & savefilepath) Else MsgBox("There was a problem saving Results file to: " & savedfilepath) End If
set objExcel = nothing set objShell = nothing
End If Else set objShell = nothing NLSApp.MessageBox("Process Canceled.") End If
Function processupdates (rowstoproc,rowno,colno) For Counter = 1 to rowstoproc LoanNumber = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno).Value score1 = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno+1).Value score2 = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno+2).Value scode = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno+3).Value LoanRefno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT convert(varchar,acctrefno)FROM loanacct WHERE loan_number = '" & LoanNumber & "'") If scode = "OK" Then NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef15 = " & score1 & ", userdef20 = " & score2 & ", userdef24 = convert(char(10),getdate(),101) where acctrefno = " & LoanRefno) ' If (Counter Mod 33) = 0 Then ' NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef24 = '09/01/2018' where acctrefno = " & LoanRefno) ' End if 'Update validation (based on udf24(last update) field newdate = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef24 FROM loanacct_detail_2 WHERE acctrefno = " & LoanRefno) If Not CDate(newdate) = Date() Then notupdated = notupdated & LoanNumber & chr(10) objExcel.Cells(rowno, 4).Value = "F2" updatefail = updatefail + 1 End If
End If rowno = rowno +1 Next If notupdated = "" Then processupdates = "1" Else objExcel.Cells(5,7).Value = "Update Failures(F2): " & updatefail processupdates = notupdated End If End Function
"/> <BUTTON Name="Remove Micro Balance" Script="currLoanNumber = InputBox("Enter a valid Loan Number","Remove Micro Balance","") currloanbal = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT current_payoff_balance from loanacct where loan_number = '" & currLoanNumber & "'") If IsNumeric(currloanbal) = false Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Invalid Loan Number Entered") Else If CDbl(currloanbal)< .01 and CDbl(currloanbal) > 0 Then confirmationmsgYN = "Payoff balance for loan " & currLoanNumber & " is " & currloanbal & ". " & chr(13) & "Do you want to set to $0.00? (Y/N)" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "This cannot be un-done." If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox(confirmationmsgYN) Then microbalupdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET current_interest_balance = 0 ,current_payoff_balance = 0 " & _ "where loan_number = '" & currLoanNumber & "'" NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(microbalupdatesql) msgbox("Completed.") Else msgbox("Canceled.") End if Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Payoff balance for loan " & currLoanNumber & " is " & currloanbal & " and does not qualify as a micro balance.") End If End if"/> <BUTTON Name="reverseDSpayments" Script="reverseDSpayments()
'ReverseDSpayments.vb 'Looks for un-reversed debt settlement payment transactions (TC8200) and their corresponding loan payment transactions 'that have been reversed. it then uses XML import to reverse the TC8200 transaction
Sub reverseDSpayments()
revtranslookupsql = "select distinct " & chr(13) & _ "'<NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE ' + " & chr(13) & _ "'TransactionCode=""8201"" EffectiveDate=""' + convert(char(8),getdate(),1) + '"" LoanNumber=""' + l.loan_number + '"" TransRefNo=""' + + convert(varchar,lth1.transrefno) + " & chr(13) & _ "'"" Amount=""' + convert(varchar,lth1.transaction_amount) + '"" RowID=""' + lth1.userdef01 + '""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS>' " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_trans_history lth1, /*lth1 represents the DS transaction*/" & chr(13) & _ "loanacct_trans_history lth2, /*lth2 represents the loan payment transaction*/" & chr(13) & _ "loanacct l " & chr(13) & _ "where lth1.userdef04 is not null " & chr(13) & _ "and lth1.acctrefno = l.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and cast(lth2.transaction_reference_no as varchar) = lth1.userdef04 /*pairs DS transaction to it loan payment transaction*/" & chr(13) & _ "and (lth1.reversal_transrefno = 0 and not lth2.reversal_transrefno = 0) /*DS transaction has not been reversed but the loan payment has been reversed*/" & chr(13) & _ "and lth2.transaction_date > '02/01/18' /*not valid for transactions prior to implementation date*/"
Do RevtransXML = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(revtranslookupsql)
'Sample output 'RevtransXML = "<NLS><TRANSACTIONS><TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""8201"" EffectiveDate=""03/21/18"" LoanNumber=""APP-00553272"" TransRefNo=""5256551"" Amount=""500.00"" RowID=""3089124""/></TRANSACTIONS></NLS>"
If Not RevtransXML = "" Then ImportXML(RevtransXML) End If
Loop Until RevtransXML = ""
End Sub"/> <BUTTON Name="Daily Maintenance Parsed" Script="NLSApp.SetScriptTimeOut(1200000) AutoCloseaddCompleted2018() msgbox("AutoCloseaddCompleted2018() comlpeted.") AutoWOaddCompletePending2018() msgbox("AutoWOaddCompletePending2018() comlpeted.") ' 'SyncACHWebpay() ' msgbox("SyncACHWebpay() skipped.") ' 'ACHCompanyUDF() ' msgbox("ACHCompanyUDF() skipped.") ' 'NonACHDetail2udf45Maint() ' msgbox("NonACHDetail2udf45Maint() skipped.") LoanCommPrefs() msgbox("LoanCommPrefs() comlpeted.") PDFP() msgbox("PDFP() comlpeted.") FirstPayDefaultFlag() msgbox("FirstPayDefaultFlag() comlpeted.") WebPayments() msgbox("WebPayments() comlpeted.") DSpaymntMaint() DebtsetFeeTransMaint() DSBilltransMaint() reverseDSpayments() msgbox("DS runs comlpeted.") LoanDetail2udf46Maint() msgbox("LoanDetail2udf46Maint() comlpeted.")
'Task edit trailing period(.). see INCCRM-417 NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("Select 0; UPDATE task_detail SET userdef06 = left(userdef06,len(userdef06)-1) from task_detail where task_refno IN (Select t.task_refno from task_detail td, task t where t.task_refno = td.task_refno and t.task_template_no = 6 and right(td.userdef06,1) = '.')") 'Remove micro balances on open accounts NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET current_interest_balance = 0 ,current_payoff_balance = 0 where current_payoff_balance <= .01 and current_payoff_balance > 0 and status_code_no = 0")
NLSApp.SetField "CIF_DETAIL_UDF11", NOW() NLSApp.MessageBox("Completed!") NLSApp.SaveScreen()

'SUBS------------------------------------------------------------- sub LoanDetail2udf46Maint() 'Maintains the next ACH payment date field in LoanDeatail2 udf46 to stay in sync with the ach.billing_next_date field 'This is to be used as a endpoint in a get command on the custom web portal.
d2_userdef46sql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef46 = u.next_date" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_detail_2 ld2," & chr(13) & _ "(" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT convert(int, l.acctrefno) as acctrefno, ld2.userdef46, convert(char(10),max(ach.billing_next_date),101) as next_date" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct_ach ach, loanacct l, loanacct_detail_2 ld2" & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = ach.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "and l.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "and ach.status = 0" & chr(13) & _ "group by l.acctrefno,ld2.userdef46" & chr(13) & _ "having (case when ld2.userdef46 is null then'' else ld2.userdef46 end ) <> convert(char(10),max(ach.billing_next_date),101)" & chr(13) & _ ") u" & chr(13) & _ "Where ld2.acctrefno = u.acctrefno"
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(d2_userdef46sql) End sub
