**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Assign Colletion Owners" Script="'###Contact view ADMINISTRATION PAGE Advanced servicing field Assign Collection owners option 'on Button click option selection 'For Looks up users in the Collection Owners group and summarized the current loan allocation in a pop-up.
Collectionowners()
NLSApp.MessageBox("Allocations Completed!")
Sub Collectionowners() loanlimitcurr = NLSApp.Getfield("CIF_DETAIL_UDF20") batchlimitcurr = NLSApp.Getfield("CIF_DETAIL_UDF21") ownerresetsql = "" loanlimitrec = "" unassignedloans = "" nextloan = "" reachedlimit = "" rowcnt = 0 newloans = 0 collectorloans = 0 Collector = "" maxlimitresetmsg = "" index1 = 0 dpdrange = "0 and 600" Summaryheader = "Loan Allocation Summary for " & NOW() & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Name" & Chr(9) & Chr(9) & Chr(9) & "New" & Chr(9) & "Total" & chr(13)
'SQL lookup Strings 'Function to identify "cured" loans update the collection owner to Admin unassigncured() '------------------
'Lookup sql to identify loans in the call campaign not assigned to a valid collection owner Pastdueloanslistsql = "Select distinct " & chr(13) & _ "l.loan_number, l.days_past_due,collection_officer_no" & chr(13) & _ "INTO #loanlist" & chr(13) & _ "from campaign_list cl, campaign_list_detail cld, loanacct l" & chr(13) & _ "where cl.campaign_no = cld.campaign_no" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = cld.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "and cl.campaign_setup_no in (select campaign_setup_no from campaign_setup where campaign_name like '%UNASSIGNED OWNERS%')" & chr(13) & _ "and convert(char(8),cl.date_created,1) = convert(char(8),getdate(),1)" & chr(13) & _ "and collection_officer_no not in (SELECT userno from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = " & SECURITY_GROUP_COLLECTION_OWNERS & ")" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT (select count(*) from #loanlist) , * from #loanlist order by collection_officer_no desc, days_past_due" & chr(13) & _ "Drop table #loanlist" 'The 1st column in the results is the total count of un-assigned loans in the active campaign 'The 2nd column in the results is a loan_number ' SAMPLE OUTPUT ' unallocated_loans loan_number days_past_due ' 3026 CP0223281 10 ' 3026 APP-01021004 30 ' 3026 APP-01083314 30 ' 3026 APP-01116168 30
'Lookup sql to identify valid collection owners and their current loan allocation collectorssql = "SELECT convert(varchar(3),count(acctrefno)) as allocation,convert(varchar(3),count(acctrefno)) + ',0,' + " & _ "convert(varchar(3),g.userno)+ ',' + username + space(30-len(username)) + ',' + substring(signonid,11,35) as list" & chr(13) & _ "INTO #collectorlist" & chr(13) & _ "from nlsusers u, nlsgroupmembers g" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join" & chr(13) & _ "loanacct l" & chr(13) & _ "on l.collection_officer_no = g.userno and status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "where g.userno = u.userno" & chr(13) & _ "and groupno IN ( " & SECURITY_GROUP_COLLECTION_OWNERS & ")" & chr(13) & _ "group by convert(varchar(3),g.userno),username,signonid" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT (select count(*) from #collectorlist) as collectors ,(select sum(convert(Int,allocation)) from #collectorlist) as assigned, list" & chr(13) & _ "from #collectorlist order by list" & chr(13) & _ "Drop table #collectorlist " 'The 1st column in the results is the total count of active collectors in the authorized security group 'The 2nd column in the results is Total allocated loans 'The 3rd column in the results is a string = [count of assigned loans],[new assigned loans (default = 0)],[collector userno],[collector userno] ' SAMPLE OUTPUT ' collectors assigned list ' 16 848 41,0,258,Brittany Beaty ' 16 848 65,0,106,Eli Foxx ' 16 848 65,0,127,Andrea Messinger
'Set "cured" (0-10 dpd) loans collection owner to Admin NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement (ownerresetsql)
'SET array to hold list of output from collectorssql collectors = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(collectorssql) assignedloans = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
redim ownerdetails(collectors-1)
For count = 1 to collectors ownerdetails(count-1) = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() nextrow = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() nextcol = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() next
'SET array to hold list of output from Pastdueloanslistsql unassignedincampaign = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(Pastdueloanslistsql)
If not unassignedincampaign = "" Then If IsNumeric(batchlimitcurr) = True Then unassignedloans = batchlimitcurr Else unassignedloans = unassignedincampaign End if
redim loanlist(unassignedloans-1)
For count = 1 to unassignedloans loanlist(count-1) = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() nextrow = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
next Else 'If SQL produces no output it is most likely due to missing campaign run for current day msgbox("No valid Collection campaign for today." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Please create a new campaign before Processing.") Exit Sub End If
msgbox("Loan Allocation limit prescribed by maximum value of " & loanlimitcurr & ".")
If IsNumeric(loanlimitcurr) = False Then loanlimitcurr = Round(unassignedloans/collectors,0) End if
'Assign collector to loans If Assigncollectors2 (collectors,unassignedloans,ownerdetails,loanlimitcurr,0,0,"",loanlist,unassignedincampaign,Summaryheader) = "" Then Personalcampaigns() End If
End Sub
Function Assigncollectors2 (collectorcnt,loans,collectordetails,limit,collectorseqno,loanseqno,reachedlimit,loanarray,unassigned,Summarymsg)
For Each owner In collectordetails Collector = Split(owner,",") collectorloans = Collector(0) If not finishall = 1 AND limit - collectorloans > 0 Then newloans = limit - collectorloans Else newloans = 0 End If collectorno = Collector(2) collectorname = Collector(3) collectorsignon = Collector(4) owner = collectorloans & "," & newloans & "," & collectorno & "," & collectorname & "," & collectorsignon
If newloans > 0 Then For assignment = 1 to newloans 'XML IMPUT to update assigned collector Addcollxml = "<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & loanarray(loanseqno) & """ CollectionOfficerNumber=""" & collectorno & """/></NLS>" 'SAMPLE XML string '<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag="1" LoanNumber="CP0123456" CollectionOfficerNumber="123"/></NLS>
ImportXML(Addcollxml) loanseqno = loanseqno + 1 'If the maximum number of loans allowed by the batch limit is reached If loanseqno > UBound(loanarray,1) Then finishall = 1 newloans = assignment owner = collectorloans & "," & newloans & "," & collectorno & "," & collectorname & "," & collectorsignon Exit For End if Next
End if Summarymsg = Summarymsg & Collector(3) & Chr(9) & newloans & Chr(9) & CDbl(newloans) + CDbl(collectorloans) & Chr(13) totnew = CDbl(totnew) + CDbl(newloans) totalloc = CDbl(totalloc) + CDbl(collectorloans)
Next
unassinedmsg = "Remaining un-assigned loans in current campaign: " & FormatNumber(unassigned - totnew,0,,,-1) NLSApp.MessageBox(Summarymsg & Chr(13) & "TOTALS" & space(24) & Chr(9) & totnew & Chr(9) & FormatNumber(totalloc + totnew,0,,,-1) & Chr(13) & Chr(13) & unassinedmsg )
Assigncollectors2 = "" End Function
Function Personalcampaigns()
' Add new personal campaigns for group members without active open personal campaigns addnewpcampaignssql = "SELECT 0;" & chr(13) & _ "INSERT INTO campaign_list (campaign_setup_no,date_created,status_flag,created_by)" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT 0,getdate(),0,userno from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = " & SECURITY_GROUP_COLLECTION_OWNERS & chr(13) & _ " and userno NOT IN (SELECT userno from nlsgroupmembers g, campaign_list cl" & chr(13) & _ "where cl.created_by = g.userno and cl.campaign_setup_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "and cl.status_flag = 0 and g.groupno = " & SECURITY_GROUP_COLLECTION_OWNERS & ")"
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(addnewpcampaignssql)
'Move newly allocated loans in the Master campaign to the appropriate personal campaign movetopcampaignssql = "SELECT 0;" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE campaign_list_detail SET campaign_no = pcamps.campaign_no, owner_uid = l.collection_officer_no" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, campaign_list_detail cld, campaign_list cl," & chr(13) & _ "(select campaign_no,created_by from campaign_list " & chr(13) & _ "where campaign_setup_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and status_flag = 0" & chr(13) & _ "--and convert(char(8),date_created,1) = convert(char(8),getdate(),1)" & chr(13) & _ "and created_by in (select userno from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = " & SECURITY_GROUP_COLLECTION_OWNERS & "))pcamps" & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = cld.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "and cld.campaign_no = cl.campaign_no" & chr(13) & _ "and l.collection_officer_no = pcamps.created_by" & chr(13) & _ "and l.collection_officer_no in (select userno from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = " & SECURITY_GROUP_COLLECTION_OWNERS & ")" & chr(13) & _ "and cld.status_flag = 0" & chr(13) & _ "and cl.status_flag not in (1)" & chr(13) & _ "and cl.campaign_setup_no in (select campaign_setup_no from campaign_setup where campaign_name like '%UNASSIGNED OWNERS%')" & chr(13) & _ "and convert(char(8),cl.date_created,1) = convert(char(8),getdate(),1)"
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(movetopcampaignssql)
Personalcampaigns = "" End Function
Function unassigncured() 'SQL to identify and build xml rows for cured or invalid status loans with assigned collectors ownerresetsql = "Select l.loan_number" & chr(13) & _ "INTO #unassign " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l " & chr(13) & _ "where l.days_past_due <= 10 " & chr(13) & _ "and l.collection_officer_no not in (0)" & chr(13) & _ "and l.status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "UNION" & chr(13) & _ "Select distinct l.loan_number " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, loanacct_detail d1, loanacct_detail_2 d2" & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = d1.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = d2.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.collection_officer_no not in (0) " & chr(13) & _ "and l.status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "and (d1.userdef22 IN ('BK-CONFIRMED', 'FRAUD CONFIRMED', 'DECEASED BORROWER', 'DECEASED CO-BORROWER','FRAUD/DISPUTE REPORTED', 'FRAUD REPORTED')" & chr(13) & _ "or d2.userdef18 = 1)" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT (select count(*) from #unassign) ,'<LOAN UpdateFlag=''1'' LoanNumber='''+loan_number+''' CollectionOfficerNumber=''0''/>' From #unassign " & chr(13) & _ "Drop table #unassign"
'Build xml list of output from ownerresetsql resets = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(ownerresetsql) If resets > 0 Then resets = 5 resetxml = "<NLS>" & chr(10) For count = 1 To resets resetxml = resetxml & NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() & chr(10) nextrow = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Next resetxml = resetxml & "</NLS>" NLSAPP.MessageBox(resetxml) ImportXML(resetxml) End If unassigncured = "" End Function"/> <BUTTON Name="View Current Owner Allocations" Script="'###Contact view ADMINISTRATION PAGE Advanced servicing field View Collector Allocations option 'on Button click option selection 'For Looks up users in the Collection Owners group and summarized the current loan allocation in a pop-up.
ViewCollectionowners()
Sub ViewCollectionowners() Collector = "" 'message header Summarymsg = " As of " & NOW() & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Name" & Chr(9) & Chr(9) & Chr(9) & Chr(9) & "Queued " & Chr(9) & " Total" & chr(13)
collectorssql = "SELECT distinct convert(varchar(3),count(acctrefno)) as allocation,convert(varchar(3),count(acctrefno)) + ',0,' " & chr(13) & _ "+ convert(varchar(3),g.userno)+ ',' + username + space(30-len(username)) as list " & chr(13) & _ ",username,g.userno ,count(acctrefno) as counts " & chr(13) & _ "INTO #collectorlist " & chr(13) & _ "from nlsusers u, nlsgroupmembers g " & chr(13) & _ "left outer join " & chr(13) & _ "loanacct l " & chr(13) & _ "on l.collection_officer_no = g.userno and status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "where g.userno = u.userno " & chr(13) & _ "and groupno IN ( 24) " & chr(13) & _ "group by convert(varchar(3),g.userno),username,g.userno order by [counts] asc,username " & chr(13) & _ " " & chr(13) & _ "select distinct g.userno as owner_uid, count(row_id) as loans,cl.campaign_no " & chr(13) & _ "INTO #personalcampaigns " & chr(13) & _ "from nlsgroupmembers g " & chr(13) & _ "left outer join " & chr(13) & _ "campaign_list_detail cld " & chr(13) & _ "on " & chr(13) & _ "g.userno = cld.owner_uid " & chr(13) & _ "left outer join " & chr(13) & _ "campaign_list cl " & chr(13) & _ "on " & chr(13) & _ "cld.campaign_no = cl.campaign_no " & chr(13) & _ "and cl.status_flag = 0 /*and cld.status_flag = 0*/ and cl.campaign_setup_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "where g.groupno = 24 " & chr(13) & _ "group by g.userno,cl.campaign_no " & chr(13) & _ "having (count(row_id) = 0 and cl.campaign_no is null) or (count(row_id) > 0 and cl.campaign_no is not null) " & chr(13) & _ " " & chr(13) & _ "SELECT distinct (select count(*) from #collectorlist) as collectors , " & chr(13) & _ "(CASE When (select sum(convert(Int,allocation)) from #collectorlist) is null then 0 Else (select sum(convert(Int,allocation)) from #collectorlist) end) as assigned, " & chr(13) & _ "(select sum(loans) from #personalcampaigns) as queued, " & chr(13) & _ "(Case When convert(varchar,p.loans) is NULL Then l.list + ',0' Else l.list + ',' + convert(varchar,p.loans) End) as list " & chr(13) & _ "from #collectorlist l " & chr(13) & _ "left outer join " & chr(13) & _ "#personalcampaigns p " & chr(13) & _ "on p.owner_uid = l.userno " & chr(13) & _ " " & chr(13) & _ "Drop table #collectorlist " & chr(13) & _ "Drop table #personalcampaigns " 'The 1st column in the results is the total count of active collectors in the authorized security group 'The 2nd column Total assigned loans 'The 3rd column in the results is a string = [count of assigned loans],placeholdedr,[collector userno],[collector name]
'SET array to hold list of collector details ( usernos and the number of loans already assigned to each collectors = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(collectorssql) assignedloans = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() queuedloans = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
'dim dynamic array to hold sql results redim ownerdetails(collectors-1)
For count = 1 to collectors
ownerdetails(count-1) = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() nextrow = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() nextcol1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() nextcol2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() next
For Each owner In ownerdetails
Collector = Split(owner,",") Summarymsg = Summarymsg & Collector(3) & Chr(9) & " " & Chr(9) & space(4) & FormatNumber(Collector(4),0,,,-1) & Chr(9) & space(4) & FormatNumber(Collector(0),0,,,-1) & Chr(13) totalloc = CDbl(totalloc) + CDbl(Collector(0)) Next
totalmsg = Summarymsg & Chr(13) & "TOTALS (" & collectors & ")" & space(33) & Chr(9) & space(2) & FormatNumber( queuedloans,0,,,-1) & Chr(9) & space(2) & FormatNumber( totalloc,0,,,-1) 'NLSApp.MessageBox(totalmsg) MsgBox totalmsg,vbYesOK+vbInformation," Current Owner Allocations" End Sub"/> <BUTTON Name="Total Un-allocated loans" Script="'###Contact view ADMINISTRATION PAGE Advanced servicing field Total Un-allocated loans option 'on Button click option selection 'For Looks up loans win the designated campaigns with no Collection Owners group assigned yet.
Viewunallocatedloans()
Sub Viewunallocatedloans() collectorloanslistsql = "Select distinct " & chr(13) & _ "l.loan_number, l.days_past_due" & chr(13) & _ "INTO #loanlist" & chr(13) & _ "from campaign_list cl, campaign_list_detail cld, loanacct l" & chr(13) & _ "where cl.campaign_no = cld.campaign_no" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = cld.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "and cl.campaign_setup_no in (select campaign_setup_no from campaign_setup where campaign_name like '%UNASSIGNED OWNERS%')" & chr(13) & _ "and convert(char(8),cl.date_created,1) = convert(char(8),getdate(),1)" & chr(13) & _ "and cl.status_flag not in (1)" & chr(13) & _ "and collection_officer_no not in (SELECT userno from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = " & SECURITY_GROUP_COLLECTION_OWNERS & ")" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT count(*) from #loanlist " & chr(13) & _ "Drop table #loanlist"
unallocatedloans = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(collectorloanslistsql)
If Not unallocatedloans = 0 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("There are currently " & FormatNumber(unallocatedloans,0,,,-1) & " un-allocated loans available.") Else NLSApp.MessageBox("There are currently no un-allocated loans associated to an active allocation campaign." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Please verify that at least one(1) allocation campaign has run for today and try again.") End if
End Sub"/> <BUTTON Name="Close Active Personal Campaigns" Script="temp1 = "select 0;" & chr(13) & _ "--UPDATE loanacct SET collection_officer_no = 0 where collection_officer_no not in (0)" & chr(13) & _ "--DELETE from campaign_list_detail where owner_uid in (select userno from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = 24) and status_flag = 0" & chr(13) & _ "Update campaign_list SET status_flag = 1 where campaign_setup_no = 0 and created_by in (select userno from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = 24) and status_flag = 0"
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(temp1) NLSApp.Messagebox("Completed")"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**
USERDEFFIELDS.object_def: <UDF StaticLeftPos="25" StaticTopPos="46" StaticWidth="139" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="173" FieldTopPos="46" FieldWidth="350" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="609" ScreenWidth="1549" ZOrder="105" ReadOnly="0"/>

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Welcome Call Emails" Script="If Weekday(NOW()) < 6 Then NLSapp.ScriptOn(false) FPAutoemailWC() NLSapp.ScriptOn(true) Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Welcome Call Email Processing only allowed Mon - Thu." & chr(13) & "Canceling.") End if
Sub FPAutoemailWC() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Automate the Welcome Call request FFLS-86, 87, 88 https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-86, https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-87, https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-88 'Updated via FFLS-265 https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-265 ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' sqlpart2 = "FROM cif_detail cd, cif c Where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'SUB WC EMAIL AUTO()'" emailfromaddr = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef01 " & sqlpart2) serverName = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef02 " & sqlpart2) wcloanssql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef18 " & sqlpart2) attempt1message = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef03 " & sqlpart2) attempt2message = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef04 " & sqlpart2) attempt3message = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef05 " & sqlpart2) loanstoprocesssql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef35 " & sqlpart2) loanstoprocess = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(loanstoprocesssql) loannumb = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(wcloanssql)
processmsg1 = "There are " & loanstoprocess & " loans to process at this time." processmsg2 = "Do you want to process all " & loanstoprocess & " loans?"
'-------Proccessing payload warning------------------- 'If there are no loans to process, cancel 'If user selectes to process all available loans, skip user input and got to processing 'If user selects to process a specific # of loans, Loop input until user selects Cancel ' OR entry is a number between 0 and the # of loans available to process
If CDbl(loanstoprocess) >= 1 Then If MsgBox(processmsg1 & chr(13) & processmsg2, 4, "WARNING! Processing payload.") = 7 Then validcnt = 0 Do processmax = InputBox(invalidText & "Please Enter the number of loans to Process." & chr(13) & "Click Cancel to quit." , "Set Processing size.", loanstoprocess) invalidText = "Invalid quantity/value entered." & chr(13) & "Entry must be a number between 0 and " & loanstoprocess & chr(13) & chr(13) If processmax <> "" Then If isnumeric(processmax) = True Then If CDbl(processmax) > 0 And CDbl(processmax) <= CDbl(loanstoprocess) Then loanstoprocess = processmax validcnt = 1 End If End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Canceling Welcome Call processing.") Exit sub End if Loop Until validcnt = 1 End If NLSApp.MessageBox(loanstoprocess & " loans will be processed.") Else NLSApp.MessageBox("There are no loans to process." & chr(13) & "Canceling Welcome Call Email processing.") End If
'-------Begin welcome call Proccessing. Lcount = 0
'Repeat process for each loan based on quantity previously selected Do Until CDbl(Lcount) = CDbl(loanstoprocess)
emailtoaddr = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() borrowername = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Riskcode = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() attemptno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() emailfromaddr = "customersupport@freedomplus.com" serverName = "Servicing FPlus"
If attemptno = "EMAIL - ATTEMPT 1" Then attemptmessage = attempt1message End If
If attemptno = "EMAIL - ATTEMPT 2" Then attemptmessage = attempt2message End If
If attemptno = "EMAIL - ATTEMPT 3" Then attemptmessage = attempt3message End If
emailbody = "Dear " & borrowername & "," & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & attemptmessage
'----Send email
'?????? UnComment next 3rows for testing email sending. Add comments for go-live?????? 'emailtoaddr = "stanley.muhammad@gmail.com" 'emailfromaddr = "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com" 'serverName = "Loan Servicing3" '************************************************************************************
NLSApp.SendEmailMessage serverName, emailtoaddr, emailfromaddr, "Welcome to FreedomPlus", emailbody ' NLSApp.SendEmailMessage serverName, "stanley.muhammad@gmail.com", emailfromaddr, "Welcome to FreedomPlus", emailbody
'----Xml import 'Updates 2 fields in the Loan Detail tab and savesa a comment that represents the text of the email sent
emailxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8""?>" & chr(13) & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & loannumb & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOANDETAIL1 UserDefined11=""" & attemptno & """ UserDefined12=""" & NOW() & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOANCOMMENTS Date=""" & NOW() & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""WC Activity"" " & _ "Comment=""" & attemptno & CHR(13) & "SENT TO: " & emailtoaddr & CHR(13) & emailbody & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(emailxml)
'---XML example---- '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> '<NLS EnforceTagExistence="1"> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag="1" LoanNumber="APP-001234567"> ' <LOANDETAIL1 UserDefined11="EMAIL - ATTEMPT 3" UserDefined12="06/21/2017"/> ' <LOANCOMMENTS Date="06/21/2017" Category="SERVICING NOTES" CommentDescription="WC Activity" 'Comment="EMAIL - ATTEMPT 1 'SENT TO: nlscontact@ffn.com 'Dear Brian Smith##, ' 'Welcome to FreedomPlus and congratulations on your loan. We would like the opportunity to 'speak with you so that we can confirm the details of your newly funded loan and ensure you 'have the correct contact information for Customer Service. Please contact us via telephone 'at (800) 297-5879 Monday - Friday 7AM - 5PM MST to complete this call. Customer Service can 'also be reached via email at customersupport@freedomplus.com, should you have any questions 'along the way. ' 'Thank you for choosing FreedomPlus. We appreciate your business. ' 'Sincerely, ' 'FreedomPlus Customer Service"/> ' </LOAN> '</NLS>
loannumb = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Lcount = Lcount + 1
Loop NLSApp.MessageBox("Welcome Call Email Processing Completed.") End Sub"/> <BUTTON Name="Import 1" Script=""/> <BUTTON Name="Import 2" Script=""/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**
USERDEFFIELDS.object_def: <UDF StaticLeftPos="25" StaticTopPos="24" StaticWidth="139" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="173" FieldTopPos="24" FieldWidth="350" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="609" ScreenWidth="1549" ZOrder="107" ReadOnly="0"/>

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Investor Transfer" Script="'###Contact view ADMINISTRATION PAGE Accounting/Finance field Investor transfer option 'on Button click option selection 'For selected file in designated directory, processes list of loans for updates to class2 (investor) field
Startrowno = 2 CellVal = "unassigned" Const xlExcel7 = 39 fplusrows = 0 cplusrows = 0 Invalidloans = 0 Invalidclass2 = 0 secsnow = "" timestring = "" targetfolder = INVESTOR_TRANFERS_PENDING_DIR completefolder = INVESTOR_TRANFERS_COMPLETED_DIR targetfolder = "\\tsclient\T\FreedomPlus Servicing\Transfers\PendingTransfers\" completefolder = "\\tsclient\T\FreedomPlus Servicing\Transfers\CompletedTransfers\" targetfolder = "\\tsclient\T\ACH\Investor Transfers\PendingTransfers\" completefolder = "\\tsclient\T\ACH\Investor Transfers\CompletedTransfers\"
'Dim dynamic array to hold sql lookup results of list of valid class2 codes redim class2list(1) class2lookupsql = "SELECT distinct code from loan_class where class_specifier = 2" 'Populate array with current class2 list in NLS Do until nextinvestor = "***END OF RESULT***" rowcnt = UBound(class2list,1)
If rowcnt = 1 Then class2list(rowcnt) = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(class2lookupsql) else class2list(rowcnt) = nextinvestor end if
nextinvestor = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
If not nextinvestor = "***END OF RESULT***" Then redim Preserve class2list(rowcnt + 1) End if
Loop
'Dim dynamic array to hold sql lookup results of list of valid loan numbers redim loanlist(1)
'object management Dim objExcel, objShell, objShellFolderFile, objFsFolder,odjFs,objFsFolderItems
'Shell objects Set objShell = CreateObject("Shell.Application") set objshellFolder = objShell.NameSpace(targetfolder) set objShellFolderFileItems = objshellFolder.Items Set objShellFolderFile = objShell.BrowseForFolder(0, "Please select the file to process.", &H0020+&H4000+&H0200, targetfolder) If Not (objShellFolderFile Is Nothing) Then strExcelPath = CStr(objShellFolderFile.Self.path)
Folderitemscnt = objShellFolderFileItems.count
'Filesys Objects set objFs = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") set objFsFolder = objFs.GetFolder(targetfolder) Foldersize = objFsFolder.size If Foldersize > 0 Then 'msgBox(objFsFolder.size) 'msgBox(objShellFolderFileItems.count) End If
'Excel objects Set objExcel = CreateObject("Excel.Application") Set objWorkbook = objExcel.Workbooks.Open(strExcelPath) objExcel.DisplayAlerts = False
'Evaluate selected excel file and mark rows with valid records for processing Do Until CellVal = "" allrowcount = allrowcount+1 CellVal = objExcel.Cells(allrowcount,1).Value InvVal = objExcel.Cells(allrowcount,3).Value validloan = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("Select count(*) from loanacct where loan_number = '" & CellVal & "'") validclass2 = 1 If (allrowcount > 1) and (not CellVal = "") Then datarows = datarows + 1
If StrComp("APP-", left(CellVal,4),1 ) = 0 Then fplusrows = fplusrows + 1 objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 4).Value = "F" End if If StrComp("CP", left(CellVal,2),1 ) = 0 Then cplusrows = cplusrows + 1 objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 4).Value = "C" End if If UBound(Filter (class2list,InvVal),1)= -1 Then validclass2 = 0 Invalidclass2 = Invalidclass2 + 1 End if If validloan = 0 Then Invalidloans = Invalidloans + 1 End if 'Set failure code - SELECT Case validloan & validclass2 case "11" validrecords = validrecords + 1 objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 2).Value = "OK"
case "01" objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 2).Value = "F1"
case "10" objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 2).Value = "F2"
case "00" objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 2).Value = "F1, F2"
End select
If objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 4).Value = "C" Then objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 5).Value = InvestorACHSync(objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 3).Value,"CONSOL PLUS") Else objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 5).Value = InvestorACHSync(objExcel.Cells(allrowcount, 3).Value,"PLUS PORTFOLIO") End If
loanlist(datarows-1) = CellVal & validloan & validclass2 redim preserve loanlist(datarows) End if Loop
'Summary message msgheader = datarows & " Records Submitted for Processing." & chr(13) & chr(13) msgline1 = "CPlus Loans: " & cplusrows & chr(13) & "FPlus Loans: " & fplusrows & chr(13) msgline2 = "Invalid Loan Numbers (F1): " & Invalidloans & chr(13) msgline3 = "Invalid Investor Designations (F2): " & Invalidclass2 & chr(13) & chr(13) msgline4 = "Total valid transferable loan records submitted: " & 0 + validrecords & chr(13) & chr(13) msgfooter = "Continue (Y/N)" 'Save summary message to worksheet objExcel.Cells(1, 7).Value = "PROCESSING SUMARY " & NOW() objExcel.Cells(2, 7).Value = msgheader objExcel.Cells(3, 7).Value = msgline1 objExcel.Cells(4, 7).Value = msgline2 objExcel.Cells(5, 7).Value = msgline3 objExcel.Cells(6, 7).Value = msgline4
If Not NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox(msgheader & msgline1 & msgline2 & msgline3 & msgline4 & msgfooter)Then 'Close without processing if "NO" objWorkbook.Close objExcel.quit set objExcel = nothing set objShell = nothing NLSApp.MessageBox("Process Canceled.") Else 'Process valid records then close and move file to Completed folder if there are no errors If processtransfers (allrowcount,Startrowno,1) = 1 Then objWorkbook.Save objWorkbook.Close objExcel.quit set objExcel = nothing set objShell = nothing objFs.GetFolder(targetfolder) objFs.MoveFile strExcelPath,completefolder & "InvestorTrans" & DateFormat(NOW(),1012) & ".xlsx" msgbox("Transfers Completed!") Else 'If there are errors in processing all valid loans msgbox("There was a problem with the Transfers and all were not Completed!") End if
End If Else set objShell = nothing NLSApp.MessageBox("Process Canceled.") End If
Function processtransfers (rowstoproc,rowno,colno) For Counter = 1 to rowstoproc LoanNumber = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno).Value refno = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno+1).Value class2 = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno+2).Value portfolio = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno+3).Value transtype = 1 target = objExcel.Cells(rowno, colno+4).Value If UBound(Filter (loanlist,LoanNumber & "11"),1) = 0 Then SyncACHCompanyupdate LoanNumber, refno, class2, portfolio, target,transtype,DateFormat(NOW(),1) End if rowno = rowno +1 Next processtransfers = 1 End Function
Sub SyncACHCompanyupdate(loannumber,refno,Investor,Portfolio,targetACH,bulktransfer,effectivedate) ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Maintains sync with Class 2 (Investor) with ACH Company and detail 2 UDF45 (Web pay ACH company) 'Triggered when individual loan account is changed or updated. ' '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
'Declare variables runtimestamp = Now() emailyn = "N" userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo() If Not loannumber = "" Then refno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT acctrefno FROM loanacct WHERE loan_number = '" & loannumber & "'") End if
If Portfolio = "C" Then Portfoliono = 1 End if If Portfolio = "F" Then Portfoliono = 0 End if
WebACH = targetACH
'SQL to look up all active ACH records that do not match target ACH Company ID nomatchACHsql = "select convert(varchar,row_id) from loanacct_ach where status = 0 and acctrefno = " & refno & " and ach_company_id <> " & targetACH 'Hold query results here nomatchACHrowID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(nomatchACHsql) class2code = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(varchar(4),codenum) from loan_class where code = '" & Investor & "'")
'Other variables modhistupdatesql = "" loanach = "" loandetail = "" achxml = "" Detail2pdatesql = "" ACHUpdatesql = ""
'Did any ACH rows not match targetACH? If Not nomatchACHrowID = "" Then Do Until nomatchACHrowID = "" '"***END OF RESULT***" ACHUpdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_ach SET ach_company_id = " & targetACH & " Where row_id = " & nomatchACHrowID NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(ACHUpdatesql) nomatchACHrowID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(nomatchACHsql) Loop
Else 'MsgBox("all match") End If
'Does the current Web Portal ACH Company ID match the correct ACH Company ID? If Not targetACH = WebACH Then Detail2updatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef45 = '" & targetACH & "' Where acctrefno = " & refno NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Detail2updatesql) End If
'Is loan part of a bulf transafer? If Bulktransfer = 1 Then Select Case Portfoliono Case 0 Investortransdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail SET userdef19 = '" & DateFormat(effectivedate, 111) & "' Where acctrefno = " & refno
Case 1 Investortransdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail SET userdef29 = '" & DateFormat(effectivedate, 111) & "' Where acctrefno = " & refno
End Select
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Investortransdatesql) End If
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET loan_class2_no = " & class2code & " where acctrefno = " & refno)
End Sub "/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

Sub ACHCompanySyncatupdateB(loannumber,refno,Investor,Portfolio,targetACH,bulktransfer,effectivedate) ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Maintains sync with Class 2 (Investor) with ACH Company and detail 2 UDF45 (Web pay ACH company) 'Triggered when individual loan account is chnaged or updated. ' '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
'Declare variables runtimestamp = Now() emailyn = "N" userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo() If Not loannumber = "" Then refno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT acctrefno FROM loanacct WHERE loan_number = '" & loannumber & "'") End if 'refno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") 'Investor = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CLASS2") 'Portfolio = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") WebACH = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45") If targetACH = "" Then targetACH = InvestorACHSync(Investor, Portfolio) End If 'SQL to look up all active ACH records that do not match target ACH Company ID nomatchACHsql = "select convert(varchar,row_id) from loanacct_ach where status = 0 and acctrefno = " & refno & " and ach_company_id <> " & targetACH 'Hold query results here nomatchACHrowID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(nomatchACHsql) class2code = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(varchar(4),codenum) from loan_class where code = '" & Investor & "'")
'Other variables modhistupdatesql = "" loanach = "" loandetail = "" achxml = "" Detail2pdatesql = "" ACHUpdatesql = ""
'Did any ACH rows not match targetACH? If Not nomatchACHrowID = "" Then Do Until nomatchACHrowID = "" '"***END OF RESULT***" ACHUpdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_ach SET ach_company_id = " & targetACH & " Where row_id = " & nomatchACHrowID NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(ACHUpdatesql) nomatchACHrowID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(nomatchACHsql) Loop
Else 'MsgBox("all match") End If
'Does the current Web Portal ACH Company ID match the correct ACH Company ID? If Not targetACH = WebACH Then Detail2updatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail_2 SET userdef45 = '" & targetACH & "' Where acctrefno = " & refno NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Detail2updatesql) End If 'Is loan part of a bulf transafer? If Bulktransfer = 1 Then Select Case Portfolio Case 0 Investortransdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail SET userdef19 = '" & DateFormat(effectivedate, 111) & "' Where acctrefno = " & refno
Case 1 Investortransdatesql = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_detail SET userdef29 = '" & DateFormat(effectivedate, 111) & "' Where acctrefno = " & refno
End Select
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Investortransdatesql) End If
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET loan_class2_no = " & class2code & " where acctrefno = " & refno)
End Sub
'DATE FORMATTING--------------------------------------------------------------------
Function DateFormat(datestring,formatcode)
If IsDate(datestring) = true Then If len(DAY(datestring)) = 1 Then daytext = "0" & DAY(datestring) Else daytext = DAY(datestring) End if
If len(MONTH(datestring)) = 1 Then mnthtext = "0" & MONTH(datestring) Else mnthtext = MONTH(datestring) End if If len(HOUR(datestring)) = 1 Then hrtext = "0" & HOUR(datestring) Else hrtext = HOUR(datestring) End if If len(MINUTE(datestring)) = 1 Then mintext = "0" & MINUTE(datestring) Else mintext = MINUTE(datestring) End if If len(SECOND(datestring)) = 1 Then sectext = "0" & SECOND(datestring) Else sectext = SECOND(datestring) End if
Select case formatcode 'U.S. = mm/dd/yyyy case 1 DateFormat = mnthtext &"/"& daytext &"/"& Right(YEAR(datestring),2)
case 101 DateFormat = mnthtext &"/"& daytext &"/"& YEAR(datestring)
'JAPAN = yyyy/mm/dd case 11 DateFormat = Right(YEAR(datestring),2) &"/"& mnthtext &"/"& daytext case 111 DateFormat = YEAR(datestring)&"/"& mnthtext &"/"& daytext
'Default with Day and timestamp removed = mon yyyy case 10077 DateFormat = MonthName(Month(datestring), False) & " " & YEAR(datestring)
'MMDDYYHHMMSS case 1012 DateFormat = mnthtext & daytext & Right(YEAR(datestring),2) & hrtext & mintext & sectext
Case Else
DateFormat = -1
End Select
Else
DateFormat = -1
End if
End Function
Function setAdminuser(acctrefno) setAdminuser = -1 'COMMENT UPDATE commentupdatetxt = "Select 0; update loanacct_comments set created_by = 0,userdef01 = 'Outbound',userdef02 = 'Zero Balance Letter',userdef03 = 'Email' " & _ "where comment_description in ('CPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER','FPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER') " & _ "and created_by <> 0 and created >= left(getdate(),11) and acctrefno IN "
Nlsapp.sqlselectstatement(commentupdatetxt & acctrefno)
'Mod HISTORY UPDATE modhistupdatetxt = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_mod_history SET mod_uid = 0, modification_description = '//VBScript// '+ char(13) + modification_description where row_id IN " modIDlist = "" modsqllookup1 = "SELECT cd.userdef18 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'UIDADMINUPDATES' "
modupdatesql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(modsqllookup1) modID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(modupdatesql & acctrefno) Do Until modID = "stop"
If modID = "***END OF RESULT***" Then modIDlist = "(" & Left(modIDlist, Len(modIDlist) - 2) & ")" modID = "stop" Else modIDlist = modIDlist & modID & ", " modID = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() End If
Loop
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(modhistupdatetxt & modIDlist)
'TRANSACTION HISTORY UPDATE transhistupdatetxt = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_trans_history SET enteredby_uid = 0, user_reference = '//VBScript//' where transrefno IN " transrefnolist = "" transqllookup2 = "SELECT cd.userdef27 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'UIDADMINUPDATES' "
transupdatesql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(transqllookup2) tranrefno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(transupdatesql & acctrefno) Do Until tranrefno = "stop"
If tranrefno = "***END OF RESULT***" Then transrefnolist = "(" & Left(transrefnolist, Len(transrefnolist) - 2) & ")" tranrefno = "stop" Else transrefnolist = transrefnolist & tranrefno & ", " tranrefno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() End If
Loop NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(transhistupdatetxt & transrefnolist)
setAdminuser = ""
End Function**###Local Functions###**
